text: Atrivimɨn akurvazir gumazir dapanim, atrivim nguibar ekiamɨn tiar akar ekiamɨn garir mɨdorozir gumazibar ganasa anemɨsefe. Ezɨ a tiar akamɨn boroghɨra tughav itima, gumazamiziba ivemara Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba faragha ikezir danganimɨn ghue. Gumazamizir avɨrim ivemara tiar akamɨn azenan ghua, anekunizɨ, a irɨzɨ me a dɨka ghuavɨra itima, an areme. Atrivim faragha ghua Elisan gani, ezɨ Elisa Godɨn akar kam isa atrivim ganɨngi. Ezɨ a datɨrɨghɨn guizbangɨn oto.
